articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: ASEAN ministers urge Myanmar to halt violence - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Southeast Asian foreign ministers urged Myanmar on Monday to halt violence, free prisoners and start its agreed dialogue during a meeting in China, while Singapore's top diplomat said the group was disappointed at its "very, very slow progress".

articles.title: Asian Qualifiers – Group G Preview: Vietnam return to action against Indonesia, UAE locks horns with Thailand | Football | News | Asian Qualifiers 2022 - The Official Home of Asian Football
articles.description: Dubai: A heated matchday in Group G of the Asian Qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 and AFC Asian Cup China 2023 awaits as Vietnam, the UAE and Thailand all go into their Monday games with a chance of being top of the group by end of the night.
